channel.title: Hacked. Great
channel.description:
Well just today I was on merchanting with some of my extra cash from slayer, and I logged out and tried to log back on and the message popped up saying "Can't log in, your account is already logged in. Please wait 30 seconds." And I knew right then, gf 25M.
Well, I logged back on and guess what? They took everything.
All my merchanting items. All my cash. All of my armour & weapons.
Wow. I love RuneScape, full of hackers, scammers, & phishers.
Well, Gf 25M.
Thanks for reading, I had full recoveries, E-mail registered, and a decent password. No idea how they hacked me. So, mostly this thread is for me to tell you guys to be careful.
P.S - ANY donations would be GREATLY APRECIATED.

item.title: Hacked. Great
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

You either downloaded something, entered something or told someone something. Impossible otherwise.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked. Great
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

No one cares if you got hacked, its no one’s fault but your own, this is not a forum to get donations from.

Read full topic
